file_content.text: You haven't won. You hear me? Your secret is already out.
My mercenaries are spread across Makeb. You cannot stop them before they contact my fleet.
Heh. Sure they can.
Heh. Yes, she can.
Heh. Of course he can.
All they have to do is kill everyone on the planet.
All she has to do is kill everyone on the planet.
All he has to do is kill everyone on the planet.
Support team: Begin adjusting the laser drills. We will unleash groundquakes at all mercenary locations.
Nadrin, prepare a groundquake.
Niar... what do you mean, "kill everyone on the planet"?
What are you talking about?
You know what I mean. The laser drills, the groundquakes... what else are scientists for?
You're bluffing.
Wouldn't be the first world the Empire's destroyed.
This is Nadrin. With the proper adjustments, I... could render most of the planet lifeless.
This is my decision, not yours. Keep silent.
Stay out of this.
Or what? You'll kill me? Doesn't matter now.
What's the point? We're the Empire. Sometimes we're cretins.
Archon? What's she talking about?
The tremors. The laser drills....
Ground team? This is Nadrin. We have been monitoring your situation, and I... could potentially trigger groundquakes to render most of the planet lifeless.
But evacuations are unfinished. Tens of thousands would be buried in rubble, or incinerated by magma. It would be... unfortunate.
Too many people know the truth. Wipe the slate clean and kill them all.
Go. Destroy all life on Makeb.
As you wish.
You're insane. Stop this!
All units, find shelter! Find shelter!
Total annihilation begins now.
Do what you can to keep our people intact. But the mercenaries are your priority.
Try to protect Imperial teams.
Your primary target is the mercenaries. Anyone else should be spared, if possible.
Minimize all casualties.
Understood.
Tell me again how I haven't won.
You've lost, Archon. Observe.
Our return to glory can wait another day.
No mercenary bases remain on satellite. No... evacuation vessels remain on satellite.
So. We're finished.
Await my orders, Nadrin.
We're negotiating. No killing.
Archon. Your mercenaries may be able to contact the Hutt fleet, but I control the fate of Makeb. Time to bargain.
A true Hutt does not bargain--and I would die for my people's glory.
I bet you would.
You paid the Regulators to lock down Makeb, but we've gone way beyond that. And I've seen what the Empire can do.
You want to bargain for your secret? You bargain with us.
Take your armies and leave Makeb. Say nothing. You will be well compensated.
The Empire will pay you.
There are still a lot of people on Makeb. Evacuate them safely and forget the Empire was here. You will be compensated.
Help the refugees.
Huh. Agreed.
You will be marked forever as betrayers. Your children will be the lowest of slaves, toiling eternally in filth.
It's a better deal. That's all.
See you offworld.
You deserve death for your crimes... but I'm feeling merciful. Leave Makeb and say nothing of what you've learned.
You can live. No more.
I'm as sick of Hutts as you are, but I don't like this.
The Imps massacred half your team already; you want the rest dead, too?
Look to your destiny. You could be warriors of legend... or betrayers, the shame of your slave grandchildren.
So we cut our losses.
You want us to handle the Archon, or have you got it under control?
The Archon is no longer a concern.
I've got it. [Kill the Archon]
Understood.
Glad you haven't gone soft after refusing to blow up the planet.
He's worth more to us alive.
Collect him and send him to Darth Marr. The Archon is now a prisoner of war.
Deliver him to Dromund Kaas. Perhaps a trial to demonstrate the Empire's strength.
Have him sent to Dromund Kaas. We'll see to his confinement and debriefing.
Collect him and deliver him to Darth Marr. I expect there's a price on his head.
I will not be the last. The Hutt Empire will return.
I'd have seen him fry. But it was nice, not killing the planet.
I can't feel my hands. I'd have liked to see Dromund Kaas again, but... you'll make sure it was worth it?
The Empire is faced with a powerful enemy. We will survive, and we will become unstoppable.
The conflict makes us strong.
I promise you one thing: No one will destroy what I have built. No one.
My Empire will endure.
Yes, my lord.
We've sacrificed worlds, and the war goes on. But the Imperial people will survive, I promise.
I'll make it all worth it.
You have a credit chip?
Hire me to save the Empire.
The Empire's not going anywhere, so long as I'm on the job.
Thank you.
There may still be time to get you a medic. Try not to talk.
Let me try to help you.
It's alright. We knew it was a suicide mission--don't think I could've borne it otherwise.
It's been an honor serving. Better than labeling boxes the rest of my life....
There is no "we," and whether the Empire survives is none of my business.
This is just a job for me.
Then damn you forever.
[Leave her to die]
My lord...?
I'm sorry....
Ground team to support: The planet is secure.
This is Sergeant Bedareux. I think we're done, but Darth Marr will need a brief from the station; I'll set it up. Support team out.
Makeb, I mean. While the war's still going on. Make sure we survive?
The age of Empire and Republic is over.
This is the way of the Archons.
When your people were young, the Hutts had mastered the galaxy.
Entaka Varl no keyash!
This is not ended.
